text:
We came here with the high expectations. But I was totally disappointed. The food was below average.

Please note that if you are coming for the dinner, no one cooks your food. Everything is prepared as there are no cooks/chefs for the dinner.

The food is below average. There many better Indian options in the area. You should try other restaurants.

The waiters dress very badly and look dirty. Their hygiene standards are very low.

AVOID THIS RESTAURANT.

Popped in here for dinner as we were staying nearby and were not disappointed! The Butter chicken and mutton rogan rogan Josh were amazing üëè beautiful flavour and just the right heat and spice. 100% recommend this place. Good food, lovely staff, quick to serve and nice atmosphere üëå

I try today's chicken biryani from the curry corner. good food & like more. excellent customer service for each person.Staff is behaving all good. Mostly the food & service is very attractive. So I strongly recommend Kurry Corner for good food...ü´∞ü§ç
Delicious meal with generous portions! The staff were so friendly and kind and I enjoyed my first meal in Singapore immensely. Our server was very lovely and welcoming :)

Well well well, truly coming here for a meal is an experience! Service is amazing as they check on us often and give helpful recommendations. Especially at the end they just gave us desserts even after we declined ordering. Service aside; the food is AMAZING! Rich, tasty and a whole chunk of well made dishes. Almost everything I tried was above average and especially good was: Chicken Tikka Masala, Samosas & Muttom Dum Briyani. Really amazing and I would be back! üíØ
